name: Martial Fighters
description:
Martial Fighter is an excellent action game, an excellent fighter game. This is also one of the best offline Role-Playing Games(RPG).

Martial Fighter will bring you through series of amazing of different experiences.

There are currently 8 fighters available, which you can choose to fight against the CPU.

Features of Martial Fighters:

  • Characters : 8 Amazingly rigged characters.
  • Multi-Camera for the very first time in a fighting game.
  • Mode : Time/ Knockout Mode.
  • Amazing Graphics and Sound Effects.
  • Commands features.
  • 12+ Kick and Punch Styles.
  • Exclusively amazing 3 kung-fu combos.
  • More Special Attack skills and in-game features.

Let's download and experience this fighting game and share with your friends right now! This fighting game will bring you the most awesome feeling and I believe that that it will give you more good time and amazing experiences.
